txt.en: There are footprints around the slain body.\n\nYou should examine foot prints.
Instance: The Tale of Tolwin
Let the events transpire.
You should run after Tolwin so that you may speak with him.
You noticed the Sûhalar was caught in a bear trap
This trap looks new and was recently constructed
Nearby is another slain body.\n\nYou should investigate the slain Sûhalar.
Search nearby for another sign of this Sûhalar slayer
There is a bear trap on the slain body.\n\nYou should examine the bear trap.
Examine the foot prints
Tolwin looks glum as he starts to tell his tale
Let the events transpire

'You are no Easterling after all. I am sorry for leading you on a chase. \n\n'My name is Tolwin. My father was in command of Cair Andros when it was taken from us by invaders. Much has led me to where I stand now...'
Run after Tolwin so that you may speak with him
You should speak with Tolwin.
'Meet me at Crithost. There are people there that need your help.'

'Now I search for my mother who I have not seen since that dreadful day. I fear the worst but I will not give up searching for her until I know for certain her fate.\n\n'A few of us who survived the invasion have taken shelter in the small village of Crithost. They are mostly farmers and a few soldiers from Cair Andros. We should head there at once as Crithost is in need of help.'
Let Tolwin tell his story.
You should speak with Tolwin.
Speak with Tolwin
You see another Sûhalar and by the looks of him, slain not long ago
Let Tolwin tell his story
Investigate the slain Sûhalar
The Sûhalar slayer must be nearby.\n\nYou should search nearby for more signs of conflict.
These fresh foot prints are very small. Too small for a man.
Speak with Tolwin
Examine the bear trap
The slain body of a Sûhalar leads you on the trail of a mysterious Sûhalar slayer.
